title: Replay system not working
body: So I played a game last night and wanted to keep it, but it won't play the recording because the file is "corrupted" and tells me to delete the file and re-download it. I've tried the other methods on reddit as well. Is it possible to get it to work?

replies.body: Did you already try deleting the file from the save directory? You should find it here: (**C:\Users\Example_Username\Documents\League of Legends\Replays**)
